    game - Variable in class game.ui.LevelCompleteScreen
    A reference to the main Game instance.
    Game - Class in game.core
    The main class that manages the game lifecycle, including world creation, view rendering, input handling, pause/menu interaction, and game loop timing.
    Game(int) - Constructor for class game.core.Game
    Constructs a Game instance and initializes the world, view, controls, input handling, game loop, and audio.

    gameCompleted() - Method in class game.core.Game
    Called when the final level is completed.
    GameCompleteScreen - Class in game.ui
    The screen shown when all levels are completed.

    gameLoopTimer - Variable in class game.core.Game
    A Timer that drives the main game loop, typically running at ~60 frames per second.
    gameOverPlayed - Variable in class game.audio.SoundManager
    Flag indicating if the game over sound has been played (to avoid repeats).
    GameOverScreen - Class in game.ui
    Represents the Game Over screen shown when the player loses.

    Constructs a GameOverScreen panel.
    gameOverSound - Static variable in class game.audio.SoundManager
    The static SoundClip for the game over sound effect.
    GameState - Class in game.core
    A serializable class that encapsulates the complete state of a game session.

    Constructs a new GameState with the specified parameters.
    GameView - Class in game.core
    The GameView class represents the main visual rendering component of the game.
    GameView(GameWorld, int, int, Game) - Constructor for class game.core.GameView
    Constructs a new GameView to render the specified game world.
    gameWorld - Variable in class game.core.GameView
    Reference to the custom game world instance.
    GameWorld - Class in game.core
    Represents the game world, including the player, levels, and game mechanics.
    GameWorld(int, Game) - Constructor for class game.core.GameWorld
    Initializes the game world by creating ground, level-specific objects, and the player.
    getBestTimes() - Method in class game.core.Game
    Returns the array of best times (in milliseconds) across all levels.
    getCurrentFrame() - Method in class game.util.Animation
    Returns the current frame of the animation.
    getCurrentNetElapsedTime() - Method in class game.core.Game
    Calculates and returns the current net elapsed time, excluding paused intervals.
    getDefaultFont(float) - Static method in class game.util.FontManager
    Shortcut for getting the default font (myPixelFont) with plain style.

    Convenience method for retrieving a font with plain style.
    getFont(String, int, float) - Static method in class game.util.FontManager

    getFrame() - Method in class game.core.Game
    Returns the main application window.
    getGameWorld() - Method in class game.core.Game

    getInitialCollectibleCount() - Method in class game.core.GameWorld
